content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences, but from what I know, there are many pubs throughout Ireland that offer live music sessions and entertainment. Here are a few pubs that are known for their lively atmosphere and traditional music sessions:

1. The Cobblestone - Dublin
2. The Crane Bar - Galway
3. An Púcán - Galway
4. The Merry Ploughboy - Dublin
5. Matt Molloy's - Westport
6. The Brazen Head - Dublin
7. De Barra's - Clonakilty
8. John Benny Moriarty's - Dingle
9. The Lock Tavern - Belfast
10. The Barge - Belfast

These are just a few of the many pubs in Ireland where you can experience traditional Irish music and entertainment.
